nodes.text: The Air Up Thaere was a roleplaying-game adventure in year two of the Living Force campaign. It was a the second adventure in the Looking In trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and Lee Pickler.

The heroes land on a space station in the Thaereian system to refuel their ship. However, their ship is sabotaged by an unknown opponent. Eventually catch up with him and he reveals that he is a member of Thaereian Intelligence and that he wants to defect. However, the Intelligence have found out and one of their agents tries to stop them.
